appetizers.name: mozzarella sticks
ingredients: LOW MOISTURE PART SKIM MOZZARELLA CHEESE (PASTEURIZED PART SKIM MILK, CHEESE CULTURES, SALT, ENZYME)
ENRICHED WHEAT FLOUR (WHEAT FLOUR, NIACIN, REDUCED IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID)
appetizers.description: flavorful and delicious. Crispy on the outside and gooey on the inside! They cook really fast in the air fryer or convection oven.

appetizers.name: chicken wings
appetizers.description: chicken wing section that is generally deep-fried and then coated or dipped in a sauce consisting of a vinegar-based cayenne pepper hot sauce and melted butter prior to serving.

cold sandwiches.name: Tuna Sandwich
cold sandwiches.description: a sandwich made from canned tuna

cold sandwiches.name: Veggie Sandwich
cold sandwiches.description: All the fresh vegetables and other healthy options you need for your diet

hot sandwiches.name: Hamburger
hot sandwiches.description: popular sandwich consisting of one or more meat patties placed in a bun or a bread roll

hot sandwiches.name: Bacon Sandwich
hot sandwiches.description: a sandwich of cooked bacon between bread that is optionally spread with butter, and may be seasoned with ketchup or brown sauce

desserts.name: ice cream
desserts.description: A rich, sweet, creamy frozen food made from variously flavored cream and milk products churned or stirred to a smooth consistency during the freezing process and often containing gelatin, eggs, fruits, nuts, etc.

desserts.name: parfait
desserts.description: A dessert consisting of layers of ice cream, fruit, etc., served in a tall glass

drinks.name: coke
drinks.description: a carbonated soft drink flavored with vanilla, cinnamon, citrus oils and other flavorings
